pageContext.claim: “Too bad we didn't have the G-7 here. I offered to pick up the entire cost, would have saved at least $35,000,000 for the USA. Best location. Very stupid people thought I would gain. Wrong! Looking at Camp David. Will announce soon.”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence to support Trump's estimate of the savings if the G-7 summit were held at his Doral resort. The decision to initially award to his own property led to bipartisan objections.
